heisig_chinese_memo: Souring in the winds there is only one bird left. The male phoenix. It scorched the other birds, never to return...
Ru_Notes:
Китайский феникс 鳳凰ほうおう (кит. фэнхуан) — мифологическая птица — спереди единорог, сзади олень, шея змеиная, хвост рыбий, спина черепашья, клюв как у курицы, появление её считается счастливым предзнаменованием. К египетскому (западному) фениксу отношения не имеет.

鳳 означает китайского феникса - самца. См. также: 凰 (コウ, オウ китайский феникс - самка). Оба кандзи используются в полном названии птицы, 鳳凰ほうおう.
Также кандзи встречается в большом числе названий мест, периодов, насекомых, растений и т.п..

Не путать японские названия "хо" (короткое "о", птица пэн), и "хо́о" (длинное "о" и следом короткое, китайский феникс фэнхуан).

  • птица хо́о (кит. фэнхуан) — обычно 鳳 самец, 凰 самка.
    • 鳳雛ほうすう
  • обр. многообещающий ребёнок

    • 鳳声ほうせい
  • эпист. Ваш голос

    • 鳳駕ほうが
  • кн. императорский экипаж
    • warodai
    鳳輦ほうれん
  • колесница с золотой птицей «хо» на крыше
  • императорский экипаж
    • warodai
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the one (一) bird (鳥) under the table (𠘨) is a phoenix
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: If you are lucky you might see a male phoenix soaring with the wind, but like any typical man, he will be adjusting his crotch.
humanum_full_description_en:
A golden inscription like a phoenix bird with a high crown and beautiful feathers, followed by " Fan " as the sound symbol. The original meaning is phoenix bird. Oracle bone inscriptions are often used as the " wind " of wind and rain, as in "Compilation" 775: "Ding (Zhen): Death to Phoenix (Wind)." Bronze inscriptions are used as the original meaning. "This is a passive sentence, which means that the king ordered a gift to the living Phoenix. (Guo Moruo)

Later, the form of the phoenix bird was simplified to be next to the " bird ", and the " fan " was moved to the top of the bird and became a pictophonetic character, from " bird " to " fan ". "Shuowen": "The god bird is also. The old man said: the elephant of the phoenix. The front and back of the phoenix, the snake-necked fish tail, the stork's 鸳思, the dragon's back, the bird's beak, the beak of the bird, the five-color preparation, from the Eastern gentleman The country, soaring beyond the world, passing through Kunqu, drinking the mainstay, the feathers are weak in the water, not in the wind cave, and the world is peaceful when you see it. From the birds, the sound." An example in the ancient book is "Poetry. Daya. "Volume A": "Fenghuang Yufei, and his feathers." "Shan Hai Jing. "The Great Wild West Classic": "The Luan bird sings by itself, the phoenix bird dances by itself, and there are all kinds of beasts.
humanum_short_description_en: A phoenix bird with high crown and beautiful feathers on a golden inscription, with " Fan " added as a sound symbol. The original meaning is phoenix bird.
humanum_full_description:
甲金文象高冠美羽的鳳鳥，後加「凡」為聲符。本義是鳳鳥。甲骨文常常假借為風雨的「風」，如《合集》775正：「鼎（貞）：亡來鳳（風）。」金文用作本義，如中方鼎：「中乎歸生鳳于王。」這是被動句，表示王命令饋贈活的鳳給中。（郭沫若）

　　後來鳳鳥之形簡化為「鳥」旁，「凡」又移到鳥的上方，成為了形聲字，從「鳥」，「凡」聲。《說文》：「神鳥也。天老曰：鳳之象也。鴻前麐後，蛇頸魚尾，鸛顙鴛思，龍文虎背，燕頷雞喙，五色備舉，出於東方君子之國，翱翔四海之外，過崐崘，飲砥柱，濯羽弱水，莫宿風穴，見則天下大安寧。从鳥，凡聲。」古書中的例子如《詩．大雅．卷阿》：「鳳皇于飛，翽翽其羽。」《山海經．大荒西經》：「鸞鳥自歌，鳳鳥自舞，爰有百獸，相群是處，是謂沃之野。」
humanum_short_description: 甲金文象高冠美羽的鳳鳥，後加「凡」為聲符。本義是鳳鳥。

Pinyin: fèng
English Definition: phoenix
Total strokes: 13; Radical: 鳥
Pictophonetic: 凡 indicates the sound; 鳥 (bird) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:

    • 几 [ jǐ ] small table; how many; a few, some
    • ⿱ Above to below

      • 鳥 [ niǎo ] bird

鳳毛麟角 [ fèng máo lín jiǎo ]: lit. as rare as phoenix feathers and unicorn horns (idiom); fig. few and far between

Shuowen 说文解字: 神鳥也天老曰鳳之象也鴻前麐後蛇頸魚尾鸛顙鴛思龍文虎背燕頜雞喙五色備舉出於東方君子之國翱翔四海之外過崑崙飲砥柱濯羽弱水莫宿風穴見則天下大安寧從鳥凡聲

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :
(1 the ancient form frequently had an inverted 王 king character, king of the birds) (2 probably a peacock head feathers) (3 a sail indicating the bird with big wings that fly's) (originally 𢐴𠤈 confused with 朋𪂙)

①傳說中的鳥王(雄的稱“鳳”；雌的稱“凰”)：鳳凰。鳳雛(幼小的鳳；喻英俊少年)。龍肝鳳髓(喻極難得的珍貴食品)。龍駒鳳雛(喻有才華的英俊青少年)。雛鳳清於老鳳聲。
②姓氏。

鳳字的基本解释

鳳
fèng
见“凤”。

鳳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fèng］
［《廣韻》馮貢切，去送，奉。］
“凤1”的繁体字。亦作“鳯1”。“鴌1”的今字。
(1)传说中的神鸟。雄的叫凤，雌的叫凰。通称为凤或凤凰。
(2)古代比喻有圣德的人。
(3)比喻婚姻关系中的男方。
(4)借喻帝王。参见“鳳邸”。
(5)凤盖，帝王仪仗。
(6)凤钗。妇女的首饰。
(7)通“風”。
(8)姓。明代有凤朝文。见《明史·云南土司传二·武定》。

鳳字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鳳； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1482第13
〔古文〕???鴌【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?馮貢切，音奉。【說文】神鳥也。【爾雅·釋鳥】鶠鳳，其雌凰。【郭註】瑞應鳥，高六尺許。【山海經】丹穴山，鳥狀如鶴，五采而文，名曰鳳。【孔演圖】鳳爲火精，生丹穴，非梧桐不棲，非竹實不食，非醴泉不飮，身備五色，鳴中五音，有道則見，飛則羣鳥從之。【廣雅】鳳凰，雞頭燕頷，蛇頸鴻身，魚尾骿翼。五色：首文曰德，翼文曰順，背文義，腹文信，膺文仁。雄鳴曰卽卽，雌鳴曰足足，昬鳴曰固常，晨鳴曰發明，晝鳴曰保長，舉鳴曰上翔，集鳴曰歸昌。【書·益稷】鳳凰來儀。【禮·禮運】鳳以爲畜，故鳥不獝。【大戴禮】羽蟲三百六十，鳳凰爲之長。又幺鳳，小鳥名。出蜀中。【蘇軾·梅花詞】倒掛綠毛幺鳳。又鳥鳳。【范成大·虞衡志】鳥鳳出桂海，其形略似鳳，音聲淸越如笙蕭，能度小曲合宮商，又能爲百鳥音。又郡名。【唐書·地理志】扶風郡至德年更曰鳳翔。又神名。【山海經】北極天樻有神，名曰九鳳。又官名。【左傳·昭十七年】鳳鳥氏，歷正也。又姓。【神仙傳】鳳綱

鳳字的源字形

字源演变：

甲骨文金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鳳字的起名意思

暂无。

phoenix
Basic explanation of words
phoenix
fèng
See "Phoenix".
phoenix
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fèng］
["Guangyun" Feng Gongqie, go to send, give. ]
Traditional characters for "凤1". Also known as "鳯1". The present character for "鴌1".
(1) The legendary bird. The male is called phoenix, and the female is called phoenix. Commonly known as phoenix or phoenix.
(2) The ancient metaphor for people with holy virtues.
(3) It is a metaphor for the man in the marriage relationship.
(4) A metaphor for the emperor. See "Feng Di".
(5) Feng Gai, the emperor's honor guard.
(6) Fengchai. Women's jewelry.
(7) Through the "wind".
(8) Last name. There was Feng Dynasty in Ming Dynasty. See "Ming Dynasty · Yunnan Tusi Biography II · Wuding".
phoenix
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　feng; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1482 Page 13
〔古文〕???鴌【Tang Yun】【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】【Zheng Yun】? Feng Gongqie, sound bong. [Said the text] God bird is also. 【Erya·Shiniao】Yifeng, its female phoenix. [Guo's Note] Ruiying Bird, six feet tall. [Shan Hai Jing] Danxue Mountain, the bird is like a crane, and the five characters are written, and the name is Phoenix. [Kong Yantu] The phoenix is the fire essence, the pill point is born, not the phoenix tree does not dwell, not the bamboo fruit but not the food, not the liquan but not the food, the body is equipped with five colors, five sounds in the middle of the sound, if there is a way, you see, and when you fly, the birds follow it. 【Guangya】Phoenix, chicken head and swallow chin, snake neck and red body, fish tail and wings. Five colors: The first text is Germany, the wing text is Shun, the back text is, the belly text is faithful, and the text is benevolent. Xiongming means 卽卽, female ming means fullness, Zhuming means solid permanence, morning ming means invention, day ming means keeping long, celebratory ming means Shangxiang, and Jiming means guichang. 【Book·Yiji】The phoenix comes to the ceremony. 【Rite·Rite Fortune】The phoenix is a beast, so the bird does not. 【Big Wearing Ceremony】Three hundred and sixty feather worms, the phoenix is long. And Yaofeng, the name of the bird. Out of Shuzhong. 【Su Shi·Plum Blossom Ci】Hang upside down with green hair Yaofeng. Bird and Phoenix again. [Fan Chengda·Yu Hengzhi] The bird and phoenix came out of the Guihai Sea, and its shape resembled a phoenix, and its sound surpassed like a shengxiao, capable of composing small tunes and combining palaces and merchants, and it can also be the sound of a hundred birds. Also the county name. 【Book of Tang·Geography】Fengxiang from Fufeng County to De Nian. Also God's name. [Shanhaijing] The Arctic Tianzi has a god, and its name is Jiufeng. Also official name. [Zuo Zhuan·17th Year of Zhao] Fengniao's family, Li Zhengye. Another surname. 【The Legend of Gods】Feng Gang

几 (стол), 杰, 鳥 (птица)

Китайский феникс 鳳凰ほうおう (кит. фэнхуан) — мифологическая птица — спереди единорог, сзади олень, шея змеиная, хвост рыбий, спина черепашья, клюв как у курицы, появление её считается счастливым предзнаменованием. К египетскому (западному) фениксу отношения не имеет.

鳳 означает китайского феникса - самца. См. также: 凰 (コウ, オウ китайский феникс - самка). Оба кандзи используются в полном названии птицы, 鳳凰ほうおう.
Также кандзи встречается в большом числе названий мест, периодов, насекомых, растений и т.п..

Не путать японские названия "хо" (короткое "о", птица пэн), и "хо́о" (длинное "о" и следом короткое, китайский феникс фэнхуан).

鳳凰ほうおう
